FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class Edge

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Represents a connection between two nodes. Uses a Definition (immutable) + State (mutable) composition pattern. Implements ICanvasElement for unified element handling.

public class Edge : ICanvasElement, INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
object
Edge
Implements
ICanvasElement
INotifyPropertyChanged

Extension Methods
LoggingExtensions.LogEdgeCreated(Edge, string)

Remarks

The edge's structural properties (Source, Target, ports, type, markers) are stored in the Definition record. Runtime state (selection, waypoints) is stored in the State object.

For backward compatibility, pass-through properties are provided that delegate to either Definition or State as appropriate.

Constructors

Edge()

Creates an edge with default definition. For backward compatibility.

public Edge()

Edge(EdgeDefinition, IEdgeState?)

Creates an edge with the specified definition and optional state.

public Edge(EdgeDefinition definition, IEdgeState? state = null)

Parameters

definition EdgeDefinition

The immutable edge definition.

state IEdgeState

The mutable edge state. If null, a new EdgeState is created.

Whether automatic routing is enabled.

Property Value

Definition

The immutable definition of this edge (identity, connections, visual type). Use with expressions to modify: edge.Definition = edge.Definition with { Label = "x" };

public EdgeDefinition Definition { get; set; }

EdgeDefinition

Id

Unique identifier for the edge. Immutable - to change, replace the Definition.

public string Id { get; }

Source

The ID of the source node. To modify, use: edge.Definition = edge.Definition with { Source = "x" };

string

Type

The visual type of the edge. To modify, use: edge.Definition = edge.Definition with { Type = EdgeType.Straight };

Gets or sets the Z-index for rendering order. Delegates to State.ZIndex. Default is CanvasElement.ZIndexEdges (200).

Gets the bounding rectangle of this edge. For edges without waypoints, returns an empty rect at origin.
